history.title: About South Beach Casino & Resort
history.description2: South Beach Casino & Resort is a modern resort offering a unique blend of gaming and relaxation. Guests can enjoy a stylish atmosphere inspired by Art Deco design. The casino features a wide selection of slot machines and table games for gaming enthusiasts. The hotel provides cozy rooms and exceptional service. Restaurants and bars offer diverse menus and a welcoming ambiance.
history.description3: Conveniently located near Winnipeg, the resort is easy to access. Entertainment events and shows are regularly hosted for guests. The loyalty program offers additional bonuses and exclusive perks. South Beach Casino & Resort is perfect for leisure, entertainment, and business gatherings. It’s a destination where excitement and comfort come together.

customHtml.title: Southern Style and Excitement
customHtml.description:
South Beach Casino & Resort welcomes guests with a vibrant Art Deco atmosphere, creating a sense of luxury and comfort. The interior features warm tones and modern design elements, making the space stylish and inviting. It’s a perfect blend of gaming excitement and relaxing resort vibes.


The casino operates daily from morning until late at night, giving guests the freedom to play at their convenience. Inside the complex, bars and restaurants offer a variety of local and international dishes. Blue Dolphin Bar delights visitors with live music and cocktails, while Mango’s Restaurant serves diverse breakfast and dinner options.


The resort hotel provides spacious rooms with modern amenities, ideal for both family vacations and business trips. Guests can enjoy the heated pool, fitness area, and conference facilities for events. Regular entertainment shows and themed evenings create a festive atmosphere.


Special attention is given to bonus programs and the Ocean Club loyalty system. Members receive exclusive offers, cashback, and additional perks, making gaming even more rewarding. The program is designed for regular guests, offering tiered benefits that grow with participation.


South Beach Casino & Resort is a destination where gaming excitement meets comfort and premium service. It’s the perfect place for entertainment, relaxation, and exclusive opportunities.


Language and Financial Services at South Beach Casino & Resort

The staff at South Beach Casino & Resort primarily communicates in English, ensuring a high level of service for guests from different regions. For international visitors, the team is ready to assist with basic requests and provide clear information, making the stay comfortable for travelers.


Payment methods at the casino are diverse and designed for convenience. Guests can use cash, major international credit cards, and electronic payment options. This flexibility allows everyone to choose the most suitable way to pay without limitations.


ATMs are available throughout the resort, supporting cash withdrawals and basic transactions. For guests arriving from abroad, currency exchange services are provided, which is especially important for tourists. All financial facilities are located in accessible areas to ensure quick service and security.


South Beach Casino & Resort aims to create the most comfortable conditions for guests, offering flexible payment options and reliable financial solutions. This makes gaming and relaxation simple and secure.


Casino Visit Rules at South Beach Casino & Resort

Visiting South Beach Casino & Resort requires following certain rules to ensure comfort and safety for all guests. The dress code is casual yet neat: visitors should look presentable and avoid overly revealing or athletic clothing. Entry is allowed only for adults, in compliance with legal requirements. A valid ID is required for admission.


Bringing your own food, drinks, or any items that may disrupt order is prohibited. Smoking is permitted only in designated areas. The casino prioritizes safety, so aggressive behavior or attempts to break gaming rules are strictly forbidden.


For convenience, a spacious parking area is available near the resort. Guests can reach the casino by car via Highway 59 or use taxi and shuttle services from Winnipeg. These rules are designed to create a comfortable and enjoyable atmosphere for everyone.


Rules list

  • • Dress code: neat clothing, no sportswear
  • • Age: adults only
  • • ID: valid identification required
  • • Restrictions: no food, drinks, or disruptive items
  • • Smoking: only in designated areas
  • • Parking: free, near the casino
  • • Transport: easy access via Highway 59

Ocean Club Loyalty Program: Your Benefits at South Beach Casino & Resort

Ocean Club is an exclusive loyalty program designed for regular guests to make every visit more rewarding and enjoyable. Members gain access to bonuses, discounts, special offers, and privileges that are not available to regular visitors. Registration is simple and free: just present a valid ID at the Ocean Club desk and receive your personal card.


Participation terms are clear: the card is used to accumulate points for every slot or table game played. These points can be redeemed for bonus credits, restaurant discounts, free hotel nights, and entry into prize draws. The program features multiple tiers—from Basic to Platinum—each unlocking new benefits. The more you play, the higher your status and the greater your rewards.


Ocean Club offers generous bonuses: a welcome bonus of up to $50, monthly promotions with extra credits, special VIP offers, and access to exclusive events. Higher tiers provide personalized gifts, priority service, and increased point accumulation rates.


Key program elements

  • • Registration: free, at the Ocean Club desk, valid ID required
  • • Terms: earn points for every game, redeem for credits and discounts

Bonuses

  • • Welcome bonus up to $50
  • • Monthly promotions with extra credits
  • • VIP privileges and exclusive events

Tiers

  • • Basic: starting level for new members
  • • Silver: enhanced bonuses and discounts
  • • Gold: access to VIP promos and prize draws
  • • Platinum: maximum perks, personalized offers

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at South Beach Casino & Resort
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers at South Beach Casino & Resort

South Beach Casino & Resort offers guests not only exciting games but also a variety of bonuses and special deals that make every visit more rewarding. The casino regularly hosts promotions for slot and table game players, providing extra credits and chances for big wins. Seasonal events feature themed prize draws and giveaways, adding more excitement to the experience. Guests can participate in tournaments with guaranteed prizes and receive bonuses for playing on specific days of the week.


There are also special offers for new players, including welcome bonuses and extra credits on their first game. Regular visitors enjoy exclusive promotions tied to holidays and weekends. The casino organizes entertainment shows and parties where additional prizes are awarded. All these offers are designed to make every visit fun and profitable.


List of bonuses and offers

  • • Welcome bonus: up to $50 on first play
  • • Weekly promotions: extra slot credits on Fridays
  • • Tournaments: guaranteed prizes up to $5,000
  • • Seasonal events: holiday prize giveaways
  • • Special weekends: double points and bonus credits
  • • Entertainment parties: chances to win exclusive prizes

Popular Games at South Beach Casino & Resort

South Beach Casino & Resort offers a wide range of games to satisfy both beginners and experienced players. The gaming floor features modern slot machines with vibrant graphics and progressive jackpots, giving players a chance for big wins. For fans of classic games, table options like blackjack and roulette provide a mix of strategy and luck. Poker variations are also available, bringing players together for thrilling rounds.


Slot machines come in various themes—from traditional fruit slots to modern video games with bonus rounds. Table games are hosted in a comfortable setting with professional dealers, creating an authentic casino atmosphere. For those seeking fast-paced action, high-stakes games and quick rounds are available. All games include opportunities for bonuses and promotions, making the experience even more exciting.


List of popular games

  • • Slots: classic and video slots with progressive jackpots
  • • Blackjack: a game of strategy and luck
  • • Roulette: European and American versions
  • • Texas Shootout: fast-paced poker variant
  • • High Card Flush: simple yet thrilling card game

Minimum & Maximum Bets at South Beach Casino & Resort

Below is a handy table with indicative minimum and maximum bet ranges at South Beach Casino & Resort. Public sources confirm slot denominations from 1 cent to $5 per credit; table games typically start at $5 and scale up depending on the table and day/time (evenings/weekends often run higher limits). Actual limits can vary on the floor.


Accuracy note: Slot denominations (1¢–$5) are stated on the official site; table-game minimums “typically $5+” come from an industry review. For any specific table/time, check the limit placard or ask the pit boss.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines $0.01 $5
Electronic tables $1–$2 $25+
Blackjack (Live) $5 $100+
Roulette(live) $5 outside $100+
Texas Shootout (table) $5 $100+
High Card Flush (table) $5 $100+

Limit Notes

  • • Slots (IGT, Aristocrat, etc.): Actual spin cost = denom × lines/credits; progressives may require max credit for jackpot
  • • Electronic tables (roulette, etc.): Limit depends on terminal configuration; shown on the device
  • • Blackjack (live): Evening/weekend tables often run higher; dedicated high-limit options
  • • Roulette (live): Inside bets may have different minimums; see table placard
  • • Texas Shootout (table): Poker-based house game; limits vary by shift
  • • High Card Flush (table): Ante/bonus bets have separate limits; confirm with dealer

Events and Entertainment at South Beach Casino & Resort

South Beach Casino & Resort is not just about gaming—it’s a hub for vibrant events and entertainment. The venue regularly hosts shows, concerts, and themed parties that create a festive atmosphere for all guests. Live music is a highlight: every week, local performers play at the Blue Dolphin Bar, and Friday and Saturday nights feature dance parties with cocktails.


Special events are organized around holidays and seasons, including New Year’s celebrations, summer festivals, and themed shows with prize giveaways. Guests can enjoy the nightclub vibe with modern music and exclusive drinks. For those who prefer a relaxed setting, lounge areas and bars offer a cozy escape.


In addition to entertainment programs, the resort runs slot and table game tournaments paired with festive promotions and bonuses. These events attract both beginners and seasoned players, creating a unique mix of excitement and fun. South Beach Casino & Resort ensures every visit feels extraordinary.


  • • Blue Dolphin Bar: weekly live music, Friday parties
  • • Themed parties: holiday events, seasonal shows, prize draws
  • • Nightclub: dancing, cocktails, modern beats
  • • Concerts: performances by local and guest artists
  • • Tournaments: gaming competitions with prizes and bonuses
  • • Lounge areas: calm spaces for relaxation

Bars, Restaurants, and Relaxation at South Beach Casino & Resort

South Beach Casino & Resort offers guests not only gaming excitement but also a complete relaxation experience with premium comfort. The resort features stylish bars and restaurants serving local and international cuisine. Mango’s Restaurant is perfect for breakfast and dinner, offering a diverse menu in a cozy setting. For cocktail lovers and live music fans, the Blue Dolphin Bar hosts evening performances and themed parties.


The resort hotel provides spacious rooms with modern amenities, including free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and comfortable seating areas. Guests can unwind in the heated indoor pool or visit the fitness center. Conference rooms are available for business meetings, while lounge areas offer a calm space for relaxation. The resort is designed to create ideal conditions for both entertainment and leisure.


South Beach Casino & Resort is a destination where gaming excitement meets culinary delights and comfortable accommodations. Whether you prefer lively parties or a quiet evening in a restaurant, you’ll find the perfect option here.


Relaxation spots

  • • Mango’s Restaurant: breakfast and dinner, diverse menu
  • • Blue Dolphin Bar: cocktails, live music, parties
  • • The Palms Buffet: themed buffets on weekends
  • • Hotel: spacious rooms, pool, fitness center
  • • Lounge areas: calm atmosphere for relaxation

items.title: What are the casino hours?
items.answer: The casino is open daily from 10:00 AM to 3:00 AM.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, major international credit cards, and electronic payments.

items.title: Are ATMs and currency exchange available?
items.answer: Yes, ATMs are on-site, and currency exchange services are offered.
